hero.title: Plan your success, one board at a time
hero.subtitle: Planit is a simple and powerful Kanban application to manage your projects and teams. Inspired by Trello, built with the best modern technologies.

boards.title: Intuitive Boards
boards.description: Organize your ideas with Kanban-style boards, easy to use and understand.

management.title: Smooth Management
management.description: Drag and drop your cards between lists for effortless project management.

production.title: Production-ready
production.description: Built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB for a reliable and fast experience.
